summary: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.
cast: Birol Ünel|Güven Kiraç|Zarah Jane McKenzie|Stefan Gebelhoff|Catrin Striebeck|Francesco Fiannaca|Mona Mur|Sibel Kekili|Ralph Misske|Philipp Baltus|Hermann Lause|Karin Niwiger|Demir Gökgöl|Cem Akin|Aysel Iscan|Orhan Güner|Herr Tekin|Meltem Cumbul|Andreas Thiel|Adam Bousdoukos|Monique Akin|Marco Greiser|Senol Ugurlu|Sileyman Kaplan|Hatun Kazci|Canan Ata|Nurcan Esmertürk|Yilmaz Canan|Alma Ouglu Sahin|Cahit Aygüler|Reinhold Schulz|Mehmet Kurtulus|Feridun Koç|Tulga Serim|Tugay Erverdi|Selim Erdogan|Tim Seyfi|Misra Tomruk|Selim Sesler|Idil Üner|Maceo Parker|Aytun Ede|Fanfare Ciocarlia
title: Contra la pared
